name: SCYTHE-FI Boss
description:
This is the boss room of a prototype/vertical slice for a Game Design Assignment for Image Campus, Argentina. It was made in less than two weeks.
It is based on the FPS-Microgame tutorial for Unity 2019.4.6f1.
Assets for the enviroment were taken from free packs from the Unity Asset Store.
Assets for the weapons and boss were taken from GameBanana (Half-Life skins)
I'm happy with the end result, I hope you like it.
The game has text in Spanish, sorry for that! If you want me to translate it let me know and I will update it.
Sounds were taken from Quake 3 and Half-Life (and its derivates).
All the music was made by me! There's more on my soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/bazztoner
